index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to statutory takings under Referendum 48, formerly known as Initiative 164 (Chapter 98 of the Laws of 1995); adding a new chapter to Title 3 of the Seattle Municipal Code, and setting a contingent effective date.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
note: This ordinance did not take effect due to the defeat of Referendum 48.
